video.title: Lola & Virginia
video.synopsis: Streetwise 12-year-old Lola is confident she's the queen of the block until spoiled rich kid Virginia comes along and gives her a run for her money.

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Virginia are in love with Carlos, so they face off to see who can get a kiss from him first. Lola plans to put on a play of Sleeping Beauty.
episodes.title: Onion trick

episodes.synopsis: John Bloon goes to the institute undercover. Lola figures out he’s really a famous actor and agrees to keep the secret, but Virginia has other ideas.
episodes.title: Incognito

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Haidé are life-long friends. Virginia is jealous of their friendship, and when Lola and Haidé buy a shirt to share, she puts together a plan.
episodes.title: I saw it first

episodes.synopsis: Lola buys two tickets for the final and invites Carlos. Virginia decides to do the same but she buys out the best seats in the whole stadium.
episodes.title: Ideal Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: A cosmetics brand is looking for a new face for their ads. Lola needs some money so she decides to participate, but of course Virginia wants to win.
episodes.title: Beauty Treatment

episodes.synopsis: Lola, Haidé and Pincho visit Pincho’s anthropologist aunt. She asks them not to tell anyone about her doll collection, but Lola takes pictures.
episodes.title: The haunted house

episodes.synopsis: Lola is starting a rock band with Gastón Bouillabaisse’s help. Lola’s dream is in danger as Gastón is about to lose his job because of Virginia.
episodes.title: Good food & Rock'Roll

episodes.synopsis: Virginia and Lola are dying for the job at Chica Planeta. So naturally, war breaks out between them when Chica Planeta visits the institute.
episodes.title: Planet Girl

episodes.synopsis: Lola is excited to go skiing with her friends, but Virginia takes over the slopes with the ski monitor, leaving her classmates out in the cold.
episodes.title: Mayhem in the snow

episodes.synopsis: Virginia manages to trick Merceditas into giving her her doll. Lola decides to help get the doll back and finds out it’s a genuine valuable antique.
episodes.title: Bye Doll

episodes.synopsis: Lola and her friends work hard to get the money to buy tickets for the new theme park, but Virginia has bought them all up.
episodes.title: Roller Coaster

episodes.synopsis: Lola can’t take any more rescue animals home with her, so she takes them to San Lorenzo. Virginia tells the principal. Lola asks a model for help.
episodes.title: Problem Pets

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Virginia are chosen to play on the same team at the school championship, but they hate each other. Can they set their rivalry aside and win?
episodes.title: Dream Team

episodes.synopsis: Virginia pulls a prank on Merceditas, but the teacher punishes Lola. Now Lola is tutoring Merceditas, and she meets Rafa, her older brother.
episodes.title: Elder Brother

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Virginia share a birthday and their parties are planned for the same time. Which one will have more guests?
episodes.title: Unhappy Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Virginia can’t believe Lola’s t-shirts are more popular than her designer clothes. Lola is determined to get everyone in town wearing her shirts.
episodes.title: Fashion Lola

episodes.synopsis: Lola, Pincho and Haidé are hoping their number will be chosen for the show at school. But of course, Virginia wants to be the star of the show.
episodes.title: Magic garden

episodes.synopsis: Lola, Pincho and Haidé meet up every month to tell their secrets and hide them in a can. Virginia gets her hands on them and starts causing trouble.
episodes.title: Secret club

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Virginia want a motorcycle. Virginia’s parents say no for once, so she’ll have to compete against Lola in the Rice Speedies contest.
episodes.title: A moped for two

episodes.synopsis: Virginia’s personal therapist decides she can go back to her old school if she can get along better with Lola. Lola thinks they should just fake it.
episodes.title: Perfect Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Lola works with her classmates on putting together a school newspaper, but they don’t have a cover story. Virginia proposes a puff piece on her.
episodes.title: Headline News

episodes.synopsis: Pincho and Carlos are the institute’s skater representatives for a big event in Barcelona. Pincho gets hurt and everyone points fingers at Lola.
episodes.title: Pair of Aces

episodes.synopsis: Lola is in love with David, but he loves Virginia, although she’s not interested. Lola and David pretend to be together to make Virginia jealous.
episodes.title: A shoulder to cry on

episodes.synopsis: In history class, the students put together their family tree. Virginia tries to make Lola look bad, but her plan backfires.
episodes.title: Kinky kindred

episodes.synopsis: Lola and Virginia are determined to settle an argument over who’s braver by spending the night at the San Lorenzo cemetery. They’re in for a fright!
episodes.title: Afraid of what?

episodes.synopsis: Chichita Gonzáles always has a good time at someone else’s expense, and Lola and Virginia work together to teach her a lesson about respect.
episodes.title: Oh no not her!

episodes.synopsis: Hugo is in love with Virginia, but she mocks him and breaks his heart. To help him, Lola and her friends get Marco Amore to look at Hugo’s dances.
episodes.title: Hugo in Love

episodes.synopsis: As president of the Marco Amore fan club, Lola writes a biography of her idol and sends it to him. Marco amore is impressed and wants to meet her.
episodes.title: Fan Club

episodes.synopsis: Lola and her friends work on building a robot for the contest. Lola suspects Virginia has some nefarious plan to win and decides to investigate.
episodes.title: Blackmail!

episodes.synopsis: Lola wants a summer job, so she offers to deliver sushi to Virginia’s father at home. Impressed with her entrepreneurial spirit, he offers her a job.
episodes.title: 30 munutes flat

episodes.synopsis: The team is about to reach the finals and become a legend. Virginia wants to be the captain and she asks her father to sponsor them to make it happen.
episodes.title: On the sidelines

episodes.synopsis: Virginia writes and publishes a book called “100 Days in San Lorenzo” where she’s the hero and Lola and her friends are the deplorable villains.
episodes.title: I survive 100 days in San Lorenzo

episodes.synopsis: Virginia is jealous of Lola’s successful program on the institute’s radio station. She decides to put on her own radio show to take her down a notch.
episodes.title: Good Morning San Lorenzo

episodes.synopsis: Virginia tells her old classmates Carlos is her boyfriend. Suspicious, they tell her she should throw a brunch to officially introduce him.
episodes.title: Love Soap

episodes.synopsis: Virginia puts on a pajama party with her old friends, but it’s so boring she invites Lola to her next party so she’ll have someone to make fun of.
episodes.title: Frog Party

episodes.synopsis: After finding a fossil, Agi and Yukio will appear in Young Geniuses. Virginia is jealous, so she buries a dinosaur skeleton under the schoolyard.
episodes.title: Tyranosaurus Virginia

episodes.synopsis: The girls at the San Lorenzo institute can’t come to an agreement on a theme for their float at the carnival. Virginia is determined to shine.
episodes.title: Carnival

episodes.synopsis: Lola tries to meet with Carlos at the ice cream shop, hoping to sit with him in the love seat. But Virginia finds out and tries to put a stop to it.
episodes.title: Frozen Heart

episodes.synopsis: The interschool Olympics are about to begin and Pincho is chosen to carry the torch. Virginia can’t stand it and starts coming up with a plan.
episodes.title: The Olympic Torch

episodes.synopsis: Even though Lola’s brothers get in the way of her schoolwork, the teacher praises her. Virginia is jealous of the teacher’s pet.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Virginia puts on a pajama party with her old friends, but it’s so boring she invites Lola to her next party so she’ll have someone to make fun of.
episodes.title: Pyjama Party

episodes.synopsis: Virginia is the center of attention when she makes the finals at the equestrian events. But then she finds out she’s competing against her old team.
episodes.title: Sant Lorenzo vs Columbus

episodes.synopsis: Every time Virginia’s father builds a building, they hang up a painting of hers there. She’s planning to really show off at the new library.
episodes.title: Brushstrokes

episodes.synopsis: Virginia wants to turn the institute into an elite school and make school uniforms obligatory. Lola and her friends come up with a plan to stop her.
episodes.title: The Uniform

episodes.synopsis: Things get complicated when Lola tries to recover her diary from the principal’s office but grabs the exam book instead. Virginia sees an opportunity.
episodes.title: Dear Diary

episodes.synopsis: Santi, one of Virginia’s old classmates, comes to the institute. Virginia remembers he was an ugly boy, so she has the principal make Lola his guide.
episodes.title: Super Lightning Man

episodes.synopsis: Antonio Redondo wants to see his yogurt girl again, but all he has are the glasses she left behind and doesn’t know it was Lola. Virginia has a plan.
episodes.title: XXIst Century Cinderella

episodes.synopsis: Unable to get Virginia to stop her compulsive shopping, the principal asks Lola to help Virginia in exchange for taking away her punishment.
episodes.title: Compulsive Buyer

episodes.synopsis: Haidé and Pincho nominate Lola for Student of the Year. In a fit of jealousy, Virginia decides she must be the next Student of the Year at all costs.
episodes.title: Dear Lola

episodes.synopsis: Virginia and the girls in class make a bet: they want to see if Virginia can destroy that perfect friendship between Lola and Haidé within a week.
episodes.title: A Boyfriend for Haide

episodes.synopsis: Haidé wants to be with Chuck. Virginia is jealous of Lola and Haidé’s friendship, so she tells everyone Lola is with Chuck to get back at Haidé.
episodes.title: High Treason

episodes.synopsis: Virginia claims she had a moment with Carlos at a party. Lola is so jealous she claims she and Carlos are together in secret. Virginia demands proof.
episodes.title: Secret Love
